Frankly, for many of us, solitary confinement does not, except in exceptional circumstances, comport with a civilized and humane system of justice.

Is almost tantamount to a death sentence for his age.  There are obviously many federal prison facilities in which Mr. Manafort can be detained.  We do a great disservice to our system of justice when we use the system in this way.

Our system of justice should not be governed by the convenience of the prosecutor's side or the defense side, to the extent that a defendant should be given a prison death sentence before trial and conviction.  Mr. Manafort being sent to solitary confinement on Rikers Island...
